oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sunday Down South - 1949-11-06 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Sunday Down South, sponsored by Lion Oil. Originally broadcast 1949-11-06, part 1. Personnel include Ott Devine (announcer), Snooky Lanson (host, performer), Beasley Smith (conductor) and the Lion Orchestra (performer), Lion Chorus (performer), Dottie Dillard (performer), and Margaret Whiting (performer). Held at the Ryman Auditorium.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Beasley Smith; Lion Orchestra; Lion Chorus; Snooky Lanson; Dottie Dillard; Margaret Whiting
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme (Beasley Smith and the Lion Orchestra, Lion Chorus) -- Opening statement (Ott Devine) -- Opening statement (Snooky Lanson) -- Let's Harmonize (Snooky Lanson, Lion Chorus) -- Snooky Lanson introduces Dottie Dillard -- Come Rain Or Come Shine (Dottie Dillard) -- Lion Oil commercial (Ott Devine, Snooky Lanson) -- Lion Oil jingle (Lion Chorus) -- Snooky Lanson introduces Margaret Whiting -- Snooky Lanson and Margaret Whiting talk -- Saint Louis Blues (Margaret Whiting) -- Snooky Lanson and Margaret Whiting talk -- Don't Cry Joe (Snooky Lanson)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Sunday down south (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Devine, Ott, 1910-1994; Lanson, Snooky; Smith, Beasley; Lion Orchestra (Musical group); Lion Chorus (Musical group); Dillard, Dottie; Whiting, Margaret
